content: However, in order to activate this secret boss, you'll need to obtain the Loong Scales from the Yellow Wind Ridge in Chapter 2.

However, in order to activate this secret boss, you'll need to obtain the Loong Scales from the Yellow Wind Ridge in Chapter 2.
